snippet: WIESEL--Elie. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their highly esteemed colleague and longtime friend, Elie Wiesel, and send condolences to his family. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their highly esteemed colleague and longtime friend, Elie Wiesel, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
